  • PointsMaterial

Class PointsMaterial

Configures the size and shape of ViewObjects that represent clouds of points.

Summary
  • Located at View.pointsMaterial.
  • Supports round and square points.
  • Optional perspective point scaling.

Hierarchy

  • Component
    • PointsMaterial
